Authors:
Renata Belisario, Luisa Salvador Borges, Gleiber Quintao
Furtado
Title:
A new report of Colletotrichum karstii causing anthracnose on
Annona muricata in Brazil
Keywords:
Ascomycota. Colletotrichum boninense. Morphology.
Phylogeny. Soursop.
Abstract:
Colletotrichum karstii causing anthracnose disease of
soursop is reported for the first time in Brazil. Cultural and
morphological characters of the identified causal agent were consistent
and resembled those described for Colletotrichum boninense complex.
These results were supported by a multilocus phylogenetic analysis of
the actin, calmodulin, chalcone synthase, and the internal transcribed
spacer gene regions. Pathogenicity tests revealed typical anthracnose
symptoms.
